full_summary:
**Tender Announcement**
================================
### Tender Title
Fleet Vehicle Insurance

### Tender Reference
cb-7247-36552644

### Amendment Number
1 (Alpha Date: 2023-08-03)

### Solicitation Number
RFI-2023-24-001

### Publication Date
2023-07-14

### Tender Closing Date
2023-08-03T14:00:00 (Expired)

### Expected Contract Start/End Date
2023-09-04 / 2024-09-04

### Tender Status
*Expired*

### Tender Summary
The Parliamentary Protective Service (PPS) invites all suppliers to submit information on fleet vehicle insurance for the protection of PPS’s vehicle fleet, currently consisting of 44 vehicles operating within the Parliamentary Precinct and National Capital Region (CNRC), in Canada and the United States.

**Scope of Work**
---------------

The insurance coverage should include all required mandatory coverages in the province of Ontario and offer additional coverages for vehicles driven in Canada and the United States and under the control of PPS authorized licensed drivers.

**Requirement Details**
-----------------------

* Insurance coverage for PPS vehicle fleet used in patrol within the Parliamentary Precinct and National Capital Region (CNRC), in Canada and the United States
* Mandatory required coverages in the province of Ontario
* Additional coverages for vehicles driven in Canada and the United States and under control of PPS authorized licensed drivers

**Tender Entity**
----------------

Parliamentary Protective Service (PPS)
Address: 155 Queen Street, Ottawa, Ontario, K1A 0B8, Canada
Contact Person: Sylvie Thibault
Email: [proposals-soumissions@pps-spp.parl.gc.ca](mailto:proposals-soumissions@pps-spp.parl.gc.ca)
Phone Number: (613) 294-6202

**Submission Guidelines**
-------------------------

The RFI package is available online: [https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender\_notice/7247/rfi-2023-24-001-fleet-insurance.pdf](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender\_notice/7247/rfi-2023-24-001-fleet-insurance.pdf) 

Deadlines apply for submissions, therefore please consult the system for detailed information \[hyperlink the RFQ document\]

We have a satisfaction guarantee.
